ygData.subject: Cazi Bind
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellows, I m a 20th level bard and plan on going to Cazi tonight. All of my friends and guildmates are typically bound in Freeport to go to Cazi but we
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellows,
I'm a 20th level bard and plan on going to Cazi tonight. All of my friends
and guildmates are typically bound in Freeport to go to Cazi but we will be
going in from Lake Rathe. After thinking about the logistics of bringing a
whole group that far, getting bound in Freeport then going to Cazi, I think
we will not. We are currently bound in Arena, which is a basically empty
zone right off Lake Rathe. This means we will have to cross the Rathe
Mountains and come to Cazi from the spectre side but having made the run
from Cazi to Lake Rathe once, I think it may be the closest bind point and
shortest run back. The casters of course will bind to whatever suits them,
hehe.
Brilinnia, waiting on second name :)
Xegony
